entry.title: How Mark Zuckerberg Became Too Big to Fail
entry.summary: How Facebook CEO are still failling even after apologizing and vowing to fix Facebook.

entry.title: What the US-Taliban talks might achieve
entry.summary: Hopes have been raised after years of despair. What might the US-Taliban talks achieve?.

entry.title: How Mark Zuckerberg Became Too Big to Fail
entry.summary: For next summer, though, Cordeiro is proposing a larger, intercontinental event in the United States. The event could fill a gap in the global soccer calendar â€” at the moment, the Euros are the only major championship scheduled for that summer

entry.title: Lindsey Vonn, the most dominant alpine skier ever, retires
entry.summary: Between 2008 and 2012, the American finished first in the cross-discipline end-of-season standings four times, a run that was marred only by a second-place showing in 2011.

entry.title: U.S. Economy Cooled as G.D.P. Grew at 2.6% Rate in Fourth Quarter
entry.summary: Residential investment, a proxy for housing construction, fell for the fourth straight quarter, as higher interest rates and declining affordability weighed on construction and sales.
